assignments.a5

Class Driver

  • java.lang.Object
    • assignments.a5.Driver

  • public class Driver
extends java.lang.Object
    CSCI 131 - Assignment 5 (JDBC) Objectives: - Implement standard SQL functionality for creation, updating, inserting, and deleting of records - Read files and update tables accordingly - Continue to devlelop File I/O skills - Implement report processing methodology

      • processCustUpdates

        private static int processCustUpdates(java.sql.Connection connection,
                                      java.io.File custUpdateFile,
                                      java.io.File errorFile)
                               throws java.io.IOException,
                                      java.sql.SQLException
        Processes the customer updates.
        Parameters:
        connection - The database connection
        custUpdateFile - The update file for customer updates
        errorFile - The error file to write errors to
        Returns:
        The number of error records
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an IOException occurs
        java.sql.SQLException - if a database error occurs
